headline: Will Johnson & Johnson's (JNJ) $2 Billion U.S. Manufacturing Move Reshape Its R&D Ambitions?
summary: On August 21, 2025, FUJIFILM announced that Johnson & Johnson will expand its U.S. footprint by establishing a dedicated 160,000+ square foot manufacturing facility at FUJIFILM’s new biopharmaceutical site in Holly Springs, North Carolina, as part of a US$2 billion commitment over ten years also expected to create about 120 new jobs. This investment, alongside ongoing plans for new and expanded facilities, underscores Johnson & Johnson’s ambition to manufacture the majority of its advanced...
